Wraith: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick Spirit scaling reduced from 1.5 to 1.2
Yamato: - Fixed various cases where you could target/select units behind walls with abilities (like Yamato's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike)

Fire Rate: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Weave|Size=20} Shadow Weave: Ambush Fire Rate reduced from +40% to +30%

Card Trick: - {AbilityIcon|Ability=Card Trick|Size=20} Card Trick Spirit scaling reduced from 1.5 to 1.2
Flying Strike: - Fixed various cases where you could target/select units behind walls with abilities (like Yamato's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20} Flying Strike)
